HTMLHtmlElement.summary: The HTMLHtmlElement interface serves as the root node for a given HTML document. This object inherits the properties and methods described in the interface.

remarks.para: You can retrieve the HTMLHtmlElement object for a given document by reading the value of the property.

summary.blockquote: NOTEThis property has been declared as deprecated by the W3C technical recommendation for HTML 4.01 in favor of use of the DTD for obtaining version information for a document.

remarks.para: Returns version information about the document type definition (DTD) of a document. While this property is recognized by Mozilla, the return value for this property is always an empty string.
